doc.field: Taxes from Mary J. Riker (1899-1905), documents relating to Margaret Riker Haskwell (1930-1942), 72 Front Street property (1903 to 1943), tax receipts (1930-1936), taxes of estate of Mary J. Riker (1907-1909), and documents relating to East 57th Street (1943-1947)
